Find an End themed Ruined Portal!: Find an End themed Ruined Portal!
Locating... (Do not buy this map until f: Locating... (Do not buy this map until finished)
repurposed_structures.midnightconfig.bla: RS Loottables That Disables Importing Modded Items
repurposed_structures.midnightconfig.imp:
Adds modded loot from vanilla structure's loot tables and
injects them into Repurposed Structure's loot tables.
Example: Snowy Pyramid gets all modded items that
vanilla Desert Temple can have
repurposed_structures.midnightconfig.bla:
Add the identifiers for Repurposed Structures's loot table you
want to turn off the automatic modded item importing code for.
Separate multiple entries with a comma.
Example:
"repurposed_structures:chests/mansions/birch,
repurposed_structures:chests/mineshafts/jungle"
examplemod.configuration.title: Example Mod Configs
affix.examplemod:generic/telepathic.desc: 生物的掉落物将传送至你身边。
affix.examplemod.spell_level.desc: %s spells cast will be %s levels higher.
affix.examplemod.mana_cost.desc: %s spells cast with this weapon will cost %s%% less mana.
affix.examplemod:telepathic.desc.staff: Mob drops will teleport to you.
affix.examplemod:festive.desc: Slain enemies have a %s%% chance to be a Loot Piñata
tooltip.examplemod.maken_sword.summary.l: §7• §9Slay the weak to absorb their attack power.
§7• §aSlay the strong to steal their vitality for your armor.
tooltip.examplemod.maken_sword.details.l: §6When Enemy Max HP < Your Max HP:
§8- §3Weapon Attack Damage Bonus: 0.25 * (Enemy AD / Your AD)
§6When Enemy Max HP > Your Max HP:
affix.examplemod:magic_weapons/festive.d: 杀死敌人有%s%%概率触发战利品大爆发
affix.examplemod:magic_weapons/telepathi: 生物的掉落物将传送至你身边
text.apotheosis.world_tier.frontier.desc: Venture forth into the dangerous world
text.apotheosis.world_tier.summit.desc: You've reached the top, but not the end
text.apotheosis.world_tier.pinnacle.desc: Lose thyself in the mountain's stormy peaks
button.apotheosis.already_activated: This World Tier is currently active
button.apotheosis.tier_changes_disabled: Manual World Tier changes are disabled in the config.
button.apotheosis.show_detailed_info.des: View Mob Buffs, Player Buffs, and Rarities
button.apotheosis.return.desc: Go back to the Tier Select screen
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.introduct: Welcome to the tutorial for Apothic World Tiers! In this tutorial, you will learn about the new World Tier system, and how to progress through it. Click "Next" to continue, or click "Skip Tutorial" to skip this tutorial.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.world_tie:
World Tiers are the progression system for Apotheosis. Unlocking and activating new World Tiers will raise the difficulty of the game, but also increase the quality of loot that you find in the world.

Hover over a World Tier's icon to see the unlock requirements, and click it to focus an unlocked one.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.tier_name: This is the name of the selected World Tier, as well as a short description of the tier.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.tier_diff:
This is the difficulty of the selected World Tier. Higher difficulties mean stronger mobs, but also better rewards.

At World Tier: Frontier and above, Apothic Invaders will begin to spawn in your world.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.detailed_:
This button will show you detailed information about the World Tier, including the buffs and debuffs for both players and mobs, as well as the drop chances for each rarity and gem purity.

If you aren't sure what Rarities or Purities are, see the Chronicle of Shadows (the in-game guidebook).
This button allows you to activate the selected world tier, if it is not already active.

Clicking "Done" will automatically activate World Tier: Haven. For all other World Tiers, you need to return here and activate them yourself.
tutorial.apotheosis.world_tier.activate_:
Normally, this button allows you to activate the selected world tier.

However, in this modpack, World Tiers are automatically activated and cannot be manually changed. You can still view the details of each World Tier, but you cannot activate or deactivate them.
text.apotheosis.world_tier_tutorial: This item has an unknown power
text.apotheosis.world_tier_tutorial.2: Press %s and activate World Tier: Haven to unlock it
affix.apotheosis:ranged/spectral.desc: You have a %s%% chance to shoot a second arrow.
affix.apotheosis:melee/festive.desc: Slain enemies have a %s%% chance to be a Loot Piñata
affix.apotheosis:melee/thunderstruck.des: Your attacks deal %s damage to nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:shield/retreating.desc: You will leap back when blocking in melee.
affix.apotheosis:generic/telepathic.desc: Mob drops will teleport to you.
Block drops will teleport to you.
affix.apotheosis:melee/executing.desc: Enemies below %s%% max health will be executed.
affix.apotheosis:melee/cleaving.desc: Attacks have a %s%% chance to also hit up to %s nearby enemies.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/enlight: This tool can place a light source at the cost of %s durability.
affix.apotheosis:shield/psychic.desc: Blocking a projectile deals %s%% of the damage to the shooter.
affix.apotheosis:shield/catalyzing.desc: Blocking an explosion will grant you great strength.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/effect/radial.d: This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/superma: This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
This tool has %s effectiveness against all blocks.
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/stonefo: Natural stones may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:breaker/ability/sandfor: Sand and similar blocks may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis.stoneforming.desc: Breaking [%s] converts it to %s, shift-right click to select a target.
affix.apotheosis:shears/effect/leafformi: Leaves may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:shears/effect/gardening: Flowers may be converted between eachother
affix.apotheosis:durable.desc: This item ignores %s%% of durability damage.
info.apotheosis.socketing:
Gems can be socketed with a Smithing Table. Item on the left, gem on the right.

Choose wisely, as removing a socketed gem is costly.
bonus.apotheosis:bloody_arrow.desc: When firing, you lose %s%% Max Health and deal %s%% damage. %s
bonus.apotheosis:leech_block.desc: Blocking an attack heals you for %s%% of the damage. %s
gem.apotheosis:overworld/royalty.bonus.p: Breaking Copper Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Raw Gold instead.
bonus.apotheosis:mageslayer.desc: Ignore %s%% of magic damage and heal for the same amount.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_ore_magnet.des: Can be used as an Ore Magnet, costing an extra %s durability.
bonus.apotheosis:twilight_treasure_gobli: Attacking an entity has a %s%% chance to summon a Treasure Goblin. %s
Taking damage has a %s%% chance to fortify you with Twilight Shields. %s
bonus.apotheosis:frozen_drops.desc: Killing an enemy with %s increases loot drops by %s%%.
item.apotheosis.gem.apotheosis:the_nethe: Gem of the Ravenous Blood Lord
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_socketing.desc: Adds one socket to an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_withdrawal.desc: Removes all socketed gems from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_rebirth.desc: Used to fuel the Reforging Table
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_enhancement.des: Used to fuel the Augmenting Table
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_unnaming.desc: Removes the affixed name from an item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_malice.desc: Applies Touch of Malice to an Affix Item
item.apotheosis.sigil_of_supremacy.desc: Overcharges every Affix on an Affix Item
item.apotheosis.iron_upgrade_smithing_te: Add chain armor or stone equipment
item.apotheosis.gold_upgrade_smithing_te: Add iron armor, weapon, or tools
item.apotheosis.diamond_upgrade_smithing: Add golden armor, weapon, or tools
block.apotheosis.gem_cutting_table.desc: Uses Gem Dust and Rarity Materials to upgrade Gems
block.apotheosis.salvaging_table.desc: Breaks down Affix Items into Rarity Materials
block.apotheosis.reforging_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Rebirth and Rarity Materials to reforge items
block.apotheosis.augmenting_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Enhancement to augment individual affixes
text.apotheosis.gems_returned: Gems will be returned to your inventory
text.apotheosis.malice_marker: Malice will be applied on craft
info.apotheosis.gem_crushing:
Your first Gem Dust is obtained by dropping any Apothic Gem into the world, and making an Anvil block fall on it.

After that, use the Salvaging Table.
info.apotheosis.gem_extraction:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The item will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.gem_expulsion:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Apothic Gems.

The gems will be destroyed in the process.
info.apotheosis.unnaming: Used in a Smithing Table to remove the affix components from an item's name.
info.apotheosis.salvaging: Rarity Materials are obtained by salvaging Affix Items in a Salvaging Table.
disconnect.apotheosis.tier_changes_disab: Manual world tier changes are disabled in the config.
error.apotheosis.gate_tier_incorrect: This Gateway can only be opened in World Tier: %s
advancements.apotheosis.progression.root:
Milestones for unlocking World Tiers in Apotheosis.
Press CTRL+T to open the select screen
advancements.apotheosis.progression.have: Haven is unlocked when you find your first affix item and is activated by default
advancements.apotheosis.progression.fron:
Equip a full set of Affix items to progress into the Frontier.
Once unlocked, use CTRL+T to activate it
advancements.apotheosis.progression.asce: Equip a full set of Uncommon gear and slay an Invader to begin your Ascent
advancements.apotheosis.progression.summ: To reach the Summit, slay the Wither, and equip a full set of Rare gear
advancements.apotheosis.progression.pinn: Entering the Pinnacle requires freeing the End, and acquiring a full set of Epic gear
advancements.apotheosis.affix.desc: Find an item with an Apothic Affix
advancements.apotheosis.boss.desc: Slay an Apothic Boss, and retrieve their affix item
advancements.apotheosis.chests.desc: Find an affix item in a chest
advancements.apotheosis.merchant.desc: Purchase an affix item from the wandering trader
advancements.apotheosis.random.desc: Retrieve an affix item from a random monster
advancements.apotheosis.gem.desc: Find a Apothic Gem, which can be socketed into Affix Items
advancements.apotheosis.ancient_gem.desc: Using the Gem Cutting Table, create a Perfect Gemstone
advancements.apotheosis.socket.desc: Using a Smithing Table, socket a Gem into an item
advancements.apotheosis.gem_cut.desc: Use the Gem Cutting Table to upgrade an Apothic Gem
Complete the Gateway of the First Frontier
Complete the Gateway of the Sunlit Ascent
Complete the Gateway of the Thundering Summit
Complete the Gateway of the Apothic Pinnacle
Acquire a Sigil of Supremacy from Wave 100 of the Endless Gateway of Apothic Invaders
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.desc: Applies %s when active and in the inventory.
item.apotheosis.potion_charm.curios_only: Only works in a Curios slot
misc.apotheosis.blacklisted_potion: Cannot be converted into a Potion Charm.
info.apotheosis.ender_lead: The Ender Lead is an item that can be used to move animals around.  Punch an animal to capture, and right click to release it.  The leash will not work on other types of entities.
message.apotheosis.item_linking_disabled: Item Linking has been disabled by the server.
painting.apotheosis.gems.title: Gems
painting.apotheosis.gems.author: Faellynna
painting.apotheosis.craig.title: Craig the Eternal
painting.apotheosis.craig.author: Astrel
painting.apotheosis.tower.title: The Tower
painting.apotheosis.tower.author: Faellynna
painting.apotheosis.window.title: A View Beyond
painting.apotheosis.window.author: Faellynna
book.apotheosis.name: Chronicle of Shadows
book.apotheosis.subtitle: Guide to Apotheosis
book.apotheosis.landing: Welcome to the world of Apotheosis.$(br2)Apotheosis is organized into $(#8080FF)Modules$(), and so is the content of this book.$(br2)Disabled modules are hidden.
death.attack.runiclib.creative_shock: %1$s had their creativity zapped out of them
death.attack.runiclib.retaliation.player: %1$s couldn't handle the backlash from attacking %2$s
death.attack.runiclib.venom: %1$s had their vital organs shut down by venom
death.attack.runiclib.venom.player: %2$s watched %1$s have their body fail due to venom
effect.runiclib.adrenaline.description: Increases the user's movement speed the lower health out of max health they have.
effect.runiclib.berserk.description: Increases the user's attack damage the lower health out of max health they have.
effect.runiclib.bleeding.description: Prevents the user to heal any health.
effect.runiclib.blood_clot.description: Prevents the user to heal from natural regeneration.
effect.runiclib.brimstone_vision.descrip: Allows the user to see clearly under lava.
effect.runiclib.chronos.description: Decreases the tick rate of the user's active effects.
effect.runiclib.confusion.description: Disables advanced F3 and hides the user's health bar.
effect.runiclib.creative_shock.descripti: Damages the user when attempting to build.
effect.runiclib.heartbreak.description: Reduces the user's max health, updates the health bar immediately.
effect.runiclib.lava_walking.description: Allows the user to walk on lava.
effect.runiclib.perception.description: Entities nearby the user will begin to glow.
effect.runiclib.pyromaniac.description: Heals the user slowly while standing in fire.
effect.runiclib.shatterspleen.descriptio: Multiplies the amount of damage taken.
effect.runiclib.tempus.description: Increases the tick rate of the user's active effects.
effect.runiclib.trail_blazing.descriptio: When not sneaking, a trail of fire will emit from the user's feet.
effect.runiclib.traversal.description: Teleports the user to their spawn location or world spawn if none is found.
effect.runiclib.venom.description: Deals lethal damage to the user over time.
effect.runiclib.water_walking.descriptio: Allows the user to walk on water.
effect.ess_requiem.pact_of_the_dead.desc: 与死者的邪恶契约。在夜晚，你的攻击将充满狂暴的力量；而在白天，你将因你的暴行而凋零燃烧。
effect.ess_requiem.rip_and_tear.descript: 强化你的一只手臂，让手指变成锋利的利爪。在狂暴状态下，死者的灵魂将赋予利爪力量。如果手中持有物品，利爪将无法伸出。
effect.ess_requiem.strain.description: 绷紧肌肉，将身体逼至极限以增强鲜血法术的威力。力量并非没有代价，施放此法术会扣除最大生命值。
effect.ess_requiem.reaper.description: 暂时化身为收割者，当你的召唤物死亡时，收割它们的灵魂以恢复法力。
effect.ess_requiem.summon_skulls.descrip: 从虚无中召唤会对敌人施法的诅咒头颅。这些头颅不太擅长用魔法支撑自己，偶尔会掉落或在地上拖行。在狂暴状态下，会召唤一个单独的、飞得更高且更强的头颅。
effect.ess_requiem.wretch.description: 从体内喷出魔法血液造成伤害。生命值较低时，伤害转变为“绝境伤害”，造成更高伤害。
effect.ess_requiem.boiling_blood.descrip: 煮沸目标的血液，造成伤害并将其点燃。血液沸腾的目标法力回复受阻，且畏惧鲜血。
effect.ess_requiem.necrotic_burst.descri: 释放一股由死者灵魂强化的凋零能量，伤害并使周围半径内的事物凋零。
effect.ess_requiem.decaying_will.descrip: 唤起凋零本身，消耗法力在召唤物倒下时重塑它们，并释放初始的强力凋零能量爆发。传说某枚戒指可以在使用此法术时阻止你自身凋零。这是坏死爆发的进阶形态。
effect.ess_requiem.corpse_explosion.desc: 引爆召唤生物的躯体，将其彻底粉碎，并留下一滩剧毒血水。这是牺牲的进阶形态。
effect.ess_requiem.finality_of_decay.des: 对目标施加倒计时。一旦倒计时归零，目标将受到重创，并开始迅速腐烂凋零。
effect.ess_requiem.ebony_armor.descripti: 在身上披挂被诅咒的乌木板甲，将你的所有身体机能强化至极致。然而，板甲会禁锢你的施法能力，使其完全无法使用。
effect.ess_requiem.protection_of_the_fal: 召唤远古之灵保护你不受伤害。消耗法力以减少受到的伤害，并使用锋利的紫色尖刺反击攻击者。
effect.ess_requiem.spikes_of_agony.descr: 释放一道怪诞能量波，被能量波击中的目标将被怪诞尖刺刺穿，造成伤害。
effect.ess_requiem.tentacle_whip.descrip: 召唤一根触手破土而出鞭挞目标，造成伤害。
effect.ess_requiem.pale_flame.descriptio: 一种毫无恨意的纯净火焰，允许使用者将痛苦与愤怒注入挥击中，并获得苍白之焰的眷顾。生命值低于40%时，当前的火焰伤害翻倍，且在命中成功时获得短暂的深渊裹尸布效果。
effect.ess_requiem.cursed_immortality.de: 引导图腾的能量（虽然有些扭曲），在死亡时消耗所有法力使你复活。
effect.ess_requiem.eternal_battlefield.d: 指定一个目标在永恒战场中战斗，创造一个没有任何事物会死亡的区域，尽管据说复活会汲取灵魂并扰乱心智。
effect.ess_requiem.twilight_assault.desc: 标记目标，一旦所有目标被标记，将自身隐形并发动打击。
effect.ess_requiem.ebony_cataphract.desc: 在身上披挂充满憎恨的乌木板甲，将你的属性强化至极限。无法施法，尝试施法会导致你猛烈向前冲刺，伤害撞到的物体。尝试“右键点击”会导致你猛击地面，潜行并“右键点击”会让你快速治疗。
effect.ess_requiem.nights_cover.descript: 仅能在夜晚施放。标记多个目标，使其受到苍白之焰的打击和触手的鞭挞。当目标被击中时，释放烟幕并获得隐形效果，此后的一小段时间内，在真实隐形状态下造成的所有攻击造成2.5倍伤害。这是暮光突袭的进阶形态。
effect.ess_requiem.damnation.description: 蓄力挥击，并标记自身周围的球形区域。蓄力完成后，对范围内的一切造成主伤害的1/2伤害，被黑炎击中的物体将受到全额伤害。被击中的实体将遭受天谴，使所有攻击消耗法力。
effect.ess_requiem.glacial_sculpting.des: 用冰川雕像粉碎召唤物，将其引爆并留下一座冰冻雕像。
effect.ess_requiem.lord_of_the_final_fro: 凋零意志的冰冻版本。据说是一位北方的冰冻女王创造了它。死去的召唤物会发生剧烈的冰爆。
effect.ess_requiem.bastion_of_light.desc: 化身为光，攻击将如无物般穿过你的身体。虽然每次格挡攻击都会消耗大量法力，如果法力降至250以下，效果将会失效。
effect.ess_requiem.overwhelming_light.de: 用光芒淹没目标，用强大的日光束击倒多个目标，并用强大的光灵追击它们。仅能在白天施放。
effect.ess_requiem.slash.description: 用魔法绷紧肌肉，以增强的力量挥剑。
effect.ess_requiem.slam.description: 用剑猛击地面，产生小型冲击波。近距离用剑刃直接命中下挥的目标会造成额外伤害。
spell.ess_requiem.pact_of_the_dead.guide: A vile pact with an undead long dead. During the night, imbue your attacks with a violent and powerful rampage, and during the day, wither and burn for your atrocities.
spell.ess_requiem.rip_and_tear.guide: Enhance one of your arms, allowing fingers to become razor sharp claws, and while under a rampage, the souls of the dead fill your claws with strength. Your claws will not come out if there is an item in the way.
spell.ess_requiem.strain.guide: Strain your muscles, pushing your body to it's limit to enhance blood spell power. Power is not without cost, and you lose max HP casting this spell.
spell.ess_requiem.reaper.guide: Temporarily become a reaper, when your summons perish, harvest their souls to regain mana.
spell.ess_requiem.summon_skulls.guide: Summon Cursed Skulls from nothingness that will cast spells at your foes. The skulls aren't the best at holding themselves up with magic, and will fall or drag themselves across the ground on occasion. While under a rampage, summon a singular, high flying, stronger skull.
spell.ess_requiem.wretch.guide: Spew magical blood forth from your body, dealing damage. When low HP, switch damage to Desperation Damage, doing more damage.
spell.ess_requiem.boiling_blood.guide: Boil a targets blood, dealing damage and setting them aflame. Targets with boiled blood find their mana regeneration compromised, and a weakness to blood.
spell.ess_requiem.necrotic_burst.guide: Release a burst of withering energy, empowered by the souls of the dead, damage and wither things around you in a radius.
spell.ess_requiem.decaying_will.guide: Call upon decay itself to rebuild your summons should they fall using mana, as well as summoning an initial burst of powerful withering energy. Tales say a certain ring could stop you from decaying when using this spell. The Evolved form of Necrotic Burst.
spell.ess_requiem.corpse_explosion.guide: Violently explode the body of a summoned creature, obliterating it, and leaving a toxic puddle of blood behind. The Evolved form of Sacrifice
spell.ess_requiem.finality_of_decay.guid: Unleash a countdown upon a target. Once the countdown reaches zero, the target takes heavy damage, and begins to rot and wither away rapidly.
spell.ess_requiem.ebony_armor.guide: Take on cursed Ebony Plating upon your body, enhancing all your physical aspects to the supreme. However, the plates shackle your spell casting, preventing it in full.
spell.ess_requiem.protection_of_the_fall: Call upon ancient spirits to protect you from harm. Uses mana to reduce oncoming damage, and retaliates against attackers using sharp purple spikes.
spell.ess_requiem.spikes_of_agony.guide: Unleash a wave of Eldritch energy, whatever the wave hits, stab with an eldritch spike, dealing damage.
spell.ess_requiem.tentacle_whip.guide: Send forth a singular tentacle to tear from the ground and whip a target, dealing damage.
spell.ess_requiem.pale_flame.guide: A flame pure of all animosity, allows the user to channel their pain and rage into a swing, and receive the care of the pale flame. When below 40% HP doubles current flame damage, and on successful hit, gain abyssal shroud for a short time.
spell.ess_requiem.cursed_immortality.gui: Channel the energy of a totem, albeit mildly warped, spending all of your mana on death to revive you.
spell.ess_requiem.eternal_battlefield.gu: Designate a target to fight in the eternal battlefield, creating an area where nothing can die, although reviving is said to drain the soul and disorient the mind.
spell.ess_requiem.twilight_assault.guide: Mark targets, once all targets are marked, cloak yourself in invisibility and strike.
spell.ess_requiem.ebony_cataphract.guide: Take on Ebony Plates filled with hatred upon your body, have your stats enhanced to the extreme. Instead of being able to cast spells, trying to cast spells will cause you to violently lunge forward, damaging what you hit. Trying to 'right click' will cause you to slam the ground violently, sneaking and 'right clicking' causes you to rapidly heal
spell.ess_requiem.nights_cover.guide: Can only be cast at night. Mark multiple targets to be struck by pale flames, and beat by tentacles. When target are struck, emit a smokescreen and gain invisibility, for a short while after, all attacks dealt while under true invisibility deal 2.5x damage. The Evolved form of Twilight Assault
spell.ess_requiem.damnation.guide: Charge up a swing, and mark a spherical radius around yourself. Once the windup is complete, hurt everything in the sphere for 1/2 of the main damage, and anything hit by the black flames for the full damage. Entities who get hit are inflicted with damned, making all attacks cost mana.
spell.ess_requiem.glacial_sculpting.guid: Crush a summon with a glacial statue, exploding them, and leaving a frozen statue behind.
spell.ess_requiem.lord_of_the_final_fros: A frozen version of decaying will. They say a frozen Queen of the North created it. Summons who die violently explode in ice.
spell.ess_requiem.bastion_of_light.guide: Become Light itself, attacks phasing through your body like nothing. Although each would be attack spends hefty mana to block, and if you drop below 250 mana, the effect stops working.
spell.ess_requiem.overwhelming_light.gui: Overwhelm targets with light, striking multiple targets down with powerful sunbeams, and chasing them down with powerful wisps. Can only be cast during the day.
aces_spell_utils.configuration.title: Ace's Spell Utils Configs
item.aces_spell_utils.example_sheath.des: On hit, summon a comet from above the entity's head
item.aces_spell_utils.example_curio.desc: A pendant that radiates with death
item.aces_spell_utils.example_imbue_curi: A strange object, hot to the touch
item.aces_spell_utils.example_passive_ab: On hit, summon a comet from above the entity's head
spell.ess_requiem.slash.guide: Tense your muscles with magic, and swing your sword with enhanced strength.
spell.ess_requiem.slam.guide: Slam the ground violently with your sword, sending a small shockwave off impact. Strike close for hitting things with your actual blade on the downswing does additional damage.
ui.enders_spells.not_empty_hand: You try and flex your claws, yet something's in the way.
ui.enders_spells.marked_for_decay: You've been marked for decay, rid yourself of the effect or suffer.
item.ess_requiem.nameless_ring.desc: The ring of an unnamed king. You feel the power of decay within.
item.ess_requiem.cataphract_ring.desc: A thorny red ring imbued with hate. They say the strength you receive from it would allow you to shatter blades even as thick as the Midnight Embrace.
enchantment.enderzoology.decay.desc: Applies the Wither effect to attacked enemies.
enchantment.enderzoology.repellent.desc: Randomly teleports enemies when they attack you.
enchantment.enderzoology.soulbound.desc: On death an item will be kept in the inventory and the level may randomly decrease.
enchantment.enderzoology.withering.desc: Applies the Wither effect to enemies hit by arrows.
commands.kiwi.configure.install: Please install Cloth Config API to use this command.
commands.kiwi.reload.failed: Configuration %s is not found or not provided by Kiwi.
item.kiwi.first_item.tip:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur.

Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
item.kiwi.first_item.tip.shift:
§2Curabitur pretium tincidunt lacus. Nulla gravida orci a odio.

Nullam varius, turpis et commodo pharetra, est eros bibendum elit, nec luctus magna felis sollicitudin mauris.

Integer in mauris eu nibh euismod gravida.
kiwi.config.cosmeticScreenKeybind.desc: Opens the Kiwi Cosmetic Screen by holding K, if you have available cosmetics
kiwi.config.debug.NBTTooltip.desc: Shows item NBT in advanced tooltips (F3+H) while holding shift
kiwi.config.debug.tagsPerPage.desc: The number of tags to show per page in advanced tooltips
kiwi.config.debug.tagsTooltip.desc: Shows item tags in advanced tooltips (F3+H)
kiwi.config.globalTooltip.desc: Enables the feature to globally add item tooltips
kiwi.config.noMicrosoftTelemetry.desc: Disables data collection added by Microsoft Mojang
kiwi.config.qol.suppressExperimentalSett: Skips the experimental settings warning screen when joining a world
msg.kiwi.no_dependencies: {1}: Module §e{2}§r requires the following modules to be enabled: §e{3}
tip.kiwi.debug_tooltip:
==========
Thank you for using Kiwi and Snownee's other mods!
Debug tags tooltips are active. %s to disable.
Hold Alt key for tag list. While tags are displayed, press Alt / Ctrl+Alt to navigate between pages.
==========
tip.kiwi.debug_tooltip.success: Debug tooltips have been disabled. You can re-enable them in the configuration.
death.attack.ess_requiem.hopping_skull: %1$s had their skull bashed in by %2$s's summoned skulls
death.attack.ess_requiem.skull_mass: %1$s was reduced to a pile of bone meal by %2$s's skull mass
death.attack.ess_requiem.decaying_will: %1$s felt the might of %2$s's decaying power
death.attack.ess_requiem.bone_claw: %1$s was ripped into tiny pieces by %2$s
death.attack.ess_requiem.twilight_assaul: %1$s cut in half in the dark by %2$s
death.attack.ess_requiem.nights_cover: %1$s ripped to nothingness in the dark by %2$s
death.attack.ess_requiem.cataphract_slam: %1$s had their face smashed in by %2$s
item.darkdoppelganger.summon_scroll.tool: Use this to summon the Dark Doppelganger!
advancement.kill_dark_doppelganger.title: Dark Doppelganger Slayer
advancement.kill_dark_doppelganger.descr: Defeated the Dark Doppelganger. A reward awaits!
advancement.summon_dark_doppelganger.des: Use the summoning scroll to call forth the Dark Doppelganger.
spell.irons_spellbooks.doppel_portal.gui: Enter through a portal summoned in front of you to exit through another portal some blocks away.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.mysterious_tri: When using it you get a random trinket.
When using it you have a chance to get another Slot for Trinkets.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.unknown_fragme: Obtained by right clicking a trinket against an amethyst block.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.amphibious_han: As if there was no water.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.blindfold_2: Mobs detect you from very close.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.broken_ankh_1: Acts like a Totem of Undying but with %1$s minutes of Cooldown.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.broken_magnet_: Attracts items within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.wooden_stick_1: You have a free damage shield.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.wooden_stick_2: It has %1$s seconds of cooldown to reset the damage.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.what_magnet_1: Attracts entities within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.vampire_blood_: When killing a mob, you heal %1$s of their HP.
If the sun hits you, you take damage over time.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.callus_1: Negate damage from: Cactus, Anvil, Hot Floor and Sweet Berry Bush.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.cracked_crown_: I used to rule the world.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.creeper_sense_: When you press Shift... YOU EXPLODE.
Yes, the BIG explosion does a LOT of damage to you.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.dark_nelumbo_l: I may be the antithesis, but the lava is still burning.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.dark_nelumbo_1: You can walk on the lava.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.experience_mag: I want those little green balls...
Attracts experience within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.explosion_proo: When hit by an explosion you get 1 TNT.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.fertilizer_1: Crops and plants grow around you.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.fragile_cloud_: Your fall is cushioned by the clouds.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.gills_3: Only removable while you are underwater.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.ice_cube_1: When hitting you apply Slowness %1$s for %2$s seconds.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.ice_cube_2: You freeze the water you walk in.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.lucky_rock_lor: I can see something that shines.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.lucky_rock_1: By breaking stone-like blocks you have a %1$s chance of obtaining precious things.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.miners_soul_1: You gain %1$s extra level of fortune.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.missing_page_1: %1$s Chance to damage mobs within %2$s blocks when hit.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.missing_page_2: The damage is %1$s of the maximum HP of the mob.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.nelumbo_1: You can walk on the water.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.pocket_lightni: Is it a good idea to put this in your pocket?
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.puffer_fish_li: When attacking, you have %1$s chance to apply Poison %2$s for %3$s seconds.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.rage_mind_1: When you take damage from an entity, all entities of the same type are marked.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.rage_mind_2: You deal +%1$s damage towards marked entities.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.reverse_card_l: Sometimes you are your own enemy.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.reverse_card_1: %1$s Chance to damage the mob that has hurt you with its own damage.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.scarab_amulet_: The Husk surrender to their king.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.sigil_of_bapho: You become immune to damage for %1$s second when killing a mob.
If you kill another mob, another second is added to the counter.
It can only be accumulated up to %1$s seconds of immunity.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.sleeping_pills: Phantoms turn to dust within %1$s blocks of you.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.super_magnet_1: Attracts items and experience within a %1$s block radius.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.tick_1: If the mob has more than 50 HP, it loses %1$s of HP at the cost of your life and hunger.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.tick_2: The mob's HP is only reduced by 50%.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.tick_3: You can't die from this item.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.tick_4: Only removable while you are burning.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.true_heart_of_: I'm only loved by the sea.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.fate_emerald_1: You get discounts from the villagers in the trades.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.dragons_eye_1: You spot hostile mobs within %1$s blocks of you.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.four_leaf_clov: You get %1$s times more loot from entities.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.unknown_f: Right Click on an Amethyst Block with a Trinket.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.fertilize: It grows, it grows, it grows!
advancements.nameless_trinkets.tear_of_t: Obtain the Tear of the Sea.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.true_hear: Obtain the True Heart of the Sea.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.moon_ston: What's your favorite thing about space? Mine is space.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.miners_so: They are still looking for it.
advancements.nameless_trinkets.light_glo: Feels like I'm wearing nothing at all.
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.hold_ctrl_l: Hold Ctrl Left For Extra Info
tooltip.nameless_trinkets.resonant_heart: When taking damage you have a %1$s chance to release a Sonic Boom.
